article_title: The 7 biggest whoppers of Kentucky's U.S. Senate race
article_text: Campaigns and independent groups just spent millions of dollars to convince Kentucky voters that everyone running for Congress this fall is a villain hoping to inflict grievous harm on hard-working families. The attacks drew blood, as intended. Here are seven of the biggest whoppers of Election '14.

article_summary:
Here are seven of the biggest whoppers of Election '14.
Campaigns and independent groups just spent millions of dollars to convince Kentucky voters that everyone running for Congress this fall is a villain hoping to inflict grievous harm on hard-working families.
The attacks drew blood, as intended.
